languages.text: "Я тоже". {n}Взгляд техножреца непроницаем и неотрывно прикован к телу, в котором обитала частица общего с Паскалем разума.{/n}
"So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body once inhabited by Pasqal's shared mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я тоже". {n}Взгляд техножреца непроницаем и неотрывно прикован к телу, в котором обитала частица общего с Паскалем разума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body in which a part of the mind shared by Pasqal used to dwell.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「同感だ」{n}技術司祭の淡々とした視線は、かつてパスカルの共有精神を宿していた肉体に注がれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body once inhabited by Pasqal's shared mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「同感だ」{n}技術司祭の淡々とした視線は、かつてパスカルの共有精神を宿していた肉体に注がれている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我也一样。”{n}帕斯卡凝视着他的聚合意识曾居住过的身体，眼中流露的情绪令人捉摸不透。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body once inhabited by Pasqal's shared mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我也一样。”{n}帕斯卡凝视着他的聚合意识曾居住过的身体，眼中流露的情绪令人捉摸不透。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Moi de même. » {n}Le regard insondable du technoprêtre ne semble pas pouvoir se détacher du corps autrefois habité par l'esprit de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body once inhabited by Pasqal's shared mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Moi de même. » {n}Le regard insondable du technoprêtre ne semble pas pouvoir se détacher du corps autrefois habité par l'esprit de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Yo también». {n}El tecnosacerdote fija su mirada inescrutable en el cuerpo que una vez albergó la mente compartida de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body once inhabited by Pasqal's shared mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo también». {n}El tecnosacerdote fija su mirada inescrutable en el cuerpo que una vez albergó la mente compartida de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ebenso." {n}Der unergründliche Blick des Techpriesters ist auf den Körper gerichtet, der einst von Pasqals geteiltem Verstand bewohnt wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body once inhabited by Pasqal's shared mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ebenso." {n}Der unergründliche Blick des Techpriesters ist auf den Körper gerichtet, der einst von Pasqals geteiltem Verstand bewohnt wurde.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ben de öyle." {n}Tekno Rahip'in esrarlı bakışları, bir zamanlar Pasqal'ın paylaştığı zihne ev sahipliği yapan bedene odaklı.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So am I." {n}The Tech-Priest's inscrutable gaze is fixed upon the body once inhabited by Pasqal's shared mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben de öyle." {n}Tekno Rahip'in esrarlı bakışları, bir zamanlar Pasqal'ın paylaştığı zihne ev sahipliği yapan bedene odaklanmış durumda.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
